name: fullstackopen-phonebook-backend
description: Backend server for the Phonebook exercise from the Fullstack Open Mooc, from the University of Helsinki.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../mooc-fullstackopen/part-02/phonebook && npm run build && mv build ../../../fullstackopen-phonebook-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy

author: Podesta
